settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid  {
      display: flex;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      width: 100%;
      gap: 0px;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div {
      box-sizing: border-box;
      transition: width 0.3s ease;
     border: none;
    padding: 10px;
}

    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div:nth-child(1) {
      width: 50%;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div:nth-child(2),
    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div:nth-child(3) {
      width: 25%;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div:nth-child(4),
    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div:nth-child(5) {
      width: 25%;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div:nth-child(6) {
      width: 50%;
    }
#shopify-section-template--17526072574106__main .collection-grid > div:nth-child(7) {
      width: 25%;
    }
  </style>

<script>
        const divs = document.querySelectorAll('.collection-grid > div');
        
        // Set default active classes for the first and last divs
        const firstActiveIndex = 0; // First div
        const lastActiveIndex = divs.length - 2; // Last div
        
        divs[firstActiveIndex].classList.add('active');
        divs[lastActiveIndex].classList.add('active');
        
        divs.forEach((div, index) => {
          div.addEventListener('mouseenter', function () {
            // Remove 'active' class from all divs except for the first and last ones if necessary
            divs.forEach(d => {
              if (d !== divs[firstActiveIndex] && d !== divs[lastActiveIndex]) {
                d.classList.remove('active');
              }
            });
        
            // Add 'active' class to the currently hovered div
            this.classList.add('active');
        
            // If the hovered div is the second or third div (index 1 or 2), remove 'active' from the first div
            if (index === 1 || index === 2) {
              divs[firstActiveIndex].classList.remove('active');
            }
        
            // If the hovered div is the fourth or fifth div (index 3 or 4), remove 'active' from the last div
            if (index === 3 || index === 4) {
              divs[lastActiveIndex].classList.remove('active');
            }
        
            // Reset all div widths
            divs.forEach((d, i) => {
              if (i === firstActiveIndex || i === lastActiveIndex) {
                d.style.width = '50%';
              } else {
                d.style.width = '25%';
              }
            });
        
            // Adjust the width of the hovered div
            this.style.width = '50%';
        
            // Adjust the surrounding divs based on the hovered div's position
            if (index === 0) {
              divs[1].style.width = '25%';
              divs[2].style.width = '25%';
            } else if (index === 1) {
              divs[0].style.width = '25%';
              divs[2].style.width = '25%';
            } else if (index === 2) {
              divs[0].style.width = '25%';
              divs[1].style.width = '25%';
            } else if (index === 3) {
              divs[4].style.width = '25%';
              divs[5].style.width = '25%';
            } else if (index === 4) {
              divs[3].style.width = '25%';
              divs[5].style.width = '25%';
            } else if (index === 5) {
              divs[3].style.width = '25%';
              divs[4].style.width = '25%';
            }
          });
        
          div.addEventListener('mouseleave', function () {
            // Reset all div widths when the mouse leaves
            divs.forEach((d, i) => {
              if (i === firstActiveIndex || i === lastActiveIndex) {
                d.style.width = '50%';
              } else {
                d.style.width = '25%';
              }
            });
        
            // Remove 'active' class from all divs except for the first and last ones
            divs.forEach(d => {
              if (d !== divs[firstActiveIndex] && d !== divs[lastActiveIndex]) {
                d.classList.remove('active');
              }
            });
        
            // Reapply the default active classes
            divs[firstActiveIndex].classList.add('active');
            divs[lastActiveIndex].classList.add('active');
          });
        });
        </script>
